snippet: The report from the retailer, whose stores include Bloomingdale’s, could provide broad insight into consumer spending heading into the fall season.
abstract: Strong results by Macy's, whose stores include Bloomingdale’s, could provide broad insight into consumer spending heading into the fall season; fiscal second-quarter profit was $279 million, or 67 cents a share, up 16 percent from $241 million, or 55 cents a share, in the year-ago quarter; revenue was $6.12 billion, up 3 percent from $5.94 billion; retailer raises its annual earnings guidance.
lead_paragraph: The report from the retailer, whose stores include Bloomingdale’s, could provide broad insight into consumer spending heading into the fall season.

headline.main: Macy’s, After Strong Results, Raises Outlook
headline.print_headline: Macy’s, After Strong Results, Raises Outlook
